revised_title: Discovery of Daily Growth-Rings in Cotton Hairs
tldr: The authors discovered daily growth-rings in the cell wall of cotton hairs, which were previously invisible under a microscope. By using a specific chemical treatment, they were able to make these growth-rings visible and count them to determine the daily growth of cotton plants. This discovery helps to understand the physical properties of cotton hairs and their growth patterns.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
